actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for young people on space-available basis.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Aviation Act, for reduced rate transportation on a space available basis for "young people". Defines "young people" as anyone between the ages of 12-21 years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for young people on space-available basis.
